    CSV_RecordSource

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CargoFlight
    Cargo inherits from Flight Cargo flights have crew, cargo, but no passengers
    Common

    CSV_Parser
    CSV Parser class Goals: - encapsulate the file open and reading in one class - remove the need to try..catch in the calling code - design the interface to allow for future extension (eg.
    Flight
    Flight - a nonstop flight departing from the home airport Flight is the parent class for Training, Cargo, and Passenger Flights

    PassengerFlight
